title: Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov: BRICS Is Focused on Reducing Dependence on US-Controlled System
description: Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov has declared that the actions of the BRICS bloc, integrated by Brazil, Russia, India, China, and South Africa, are focused on reducing dependency on the economic system managed by the U.S. and its Western allies. He denied a possible unified currency for all BRICS countries at this juncture. Russian Foreign […]

title: Only 5.8% Of Bitcoin Supply Is Held On Exchanges
description: The current state of Bitcoin’s distribution and whale activity reflects a significant shift in the cryptocurrency landscape since its peak in December 2017.
